In a horrible turn of events now she was the one getting hugged. Fubuki chuckled nervously.

<font color = white>&#34;So uh, how about we team u--&#34;</font>

Her eyes widened in terror as he was threatening to fall on top of her. This wasn&#39;t even about the fight anymore, he was threatening to put her in the hospital.

<font color = white>&#34;YOU KNOW YOU CAN&#39;T HURT EACH OTHER RIGHT?!&#34;</font>

It was a miracle as she slipped past him, her body crouched and then turned to the side before being turned into mashed potatoes. Even if the Akimichi was holding back his strength Fubuki was terrified nonetheless.

Then she glanced at what was happening next to her - her teammate got one of his streamers popped. Knowing there was no way to defeat the Akimichi she turned around and also lunged towards Yurei, trying to quickly grab one of his streamers in a most likely futile attempt.
[D- Agi vs D Agi, 2/3 DT aganst Akimichi - Grapple got broken]</font></font></font>

  <font color = white>&#34;If I&#39;m out I&#39;m out.&#34;</font> Was fun while it lasted. Whoever survived this would have to fight two double-teaming, full-banner spiders anyways, so it was a wash.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=070231171f9894fb266d003ae5fa12f67ca0d582f404208b2a3b26288c12c70b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">The short-tempered youth</a> kept his gaze trained upon the man situated at their front door, his arms folded over his chest. With his eyesight, he&#39;s able to pick up on the man&#39;s items from afar.

Two swords, and a bunch of bloodied headbands of the fallen. It causes his expression to sour. The message was heard loud and clear-- an obvious threat.

<font color = white>&#34;Those headbands...&#34;</font> he says, kicking off of the wall to land down below. He commits the man&#39;s face to memory, not crazy enough to pick a fight without tools of his own.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff>Kohana listened intently as the mechanical voice filled the air, her heart pounding with fear and determination. She observed the envoy steadily, taking in every word and detail. Her eyes briefly flickered to the bloodied headbands, a surge of sorrow, but she remained silent.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb460e93f39a4735360308f1741bdf79cdfa1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The thoughtful, composed girl</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#be0000><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=acd63959934fdaceff0bc0f6dec5079e839cecc2712ba6ca072a4f70394ab74f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #be0000;">The somber-looking girl</a> wasn&#39;t quite sure what was going on so for the most part she intended to remain quiet and observant, seeing as a Chuunin was called, this certainly wasn&#39;t her place to step forward or engage in any fashion. Being as short as she was, it was a bit tough to see through the crowd so she stepped forward somewhat to get a better look of things.

It was declared that some of the headbands belonged to their own. She cut a sharp gaze toward the &#39;messenger&#39;. Though unknown to her, she was visibly irritated that people from her home had been cut down. Someday her and her friends would be out there.

<font color = white>&#34;Tch...&#34;</font> still she remained quiet.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=7d0a6a54c861c4b0ec6b3b57d13854e218323083e3a991310323ef8a45d2b35f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Mugen, Yurei [sliteyes]</a> arrives later than intended due to some difficulties. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=070231171f9894fb266d003ae5fa12f67ca0d582f404208b2a3b26288c12c70b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #996633;">The short-tempered youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> So what.. you want a medal or something? <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=01a0e2984e23a6c36d5c97eeacf025b411586016e5a67d5a54f47b63d685dab1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The well dressed red-head</a> lip curled, she was in no place to speak on such matters but she could not help but say something loud enough for her peers to hear. 

<font color = white>&#34;There is only one of them.&#34;</font> She pointed out and looked at the back of the older Shinobi. Would such an offense be let to pass? They had the bodies....but she was one of those bodies herself....</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#99ffcc><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=2ae74ed56951e778a26654a2f7f594cc3b8ba1bfeaaac2af869339b469348cdd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #99ffcc;">Kusanari</a> looked at sensei as soon as the headbands.<font color = white>&#34;So we are next? <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#938a6e>Calmness remained with him throughout the stiff warning.

A Swordsman Messenger declared those he represented an enemy of their entire village. The foremost thought on his mind, reflected from a statement like that, could only be...

<font color = white>&#34;Their days are numbered.&#34;</font>
A soft, muffled murmur, beyond earshot.

More importantly, he&#39;s eager to see whether their superiors might shoot this messenger, who arrived here bearing the highest of hostilities. It was only karma. Right?<br>(<a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b9d925a76c57b0ebc03e90d81e49339c5a83bd24a62a3c73a104c2033d6788ed style = "text-decoration: none; color: #938a6e;">The blond lad</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#969696> From a squatting position, the girl would begin slapping the ground with three hands to voice her disgust for this kind of attitude!  This was sounding much like a threat, as if he was bragging about killing their genin!

<font color = white>&#34;Ayyo!  How brave!  Killing genin younger than yerself, must feel nice, ye?  Then coming to our gates?  Bragging?  threatening?  Ay ay ay ay.   Message recieved.&#34;</font>

Yeah, this Tsuchigumo girl was pissed, she was ready for a fight!  BRING IT!  Though as for making decisions or actions?  That&#39;s left to Bathroom Sensei.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e96dd5bcc76d53dd8f8b0621ba373107eb149febb9023bc3d43d26e49e9f2c52 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #969696;">Tsuchigomo, Tsunek [Albino]</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#96003c><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">The red-haired boy</a> couldn't really see the bloody headbands because; his eye sight was awful, and because there were a bunch of people in the way. So the weight of the man's threatening speech didn't really land with the generally dumb boy.

But he did at least still understand it was a threat. It sounded like people had been caught by... bandits? Probably bandits. Outside the walls or something similar. A mostly uneeded warning for Hideo as he had no desire to go beyond the walls to begin with.

The guy had a bunch of swords, for example. What did he have? A cool rock he found on the way here and some loose change. It would take a long while before he was confident and geared enough to much further than he was right now. But he would go that far eventually.

Someone had to avenge who ever the messenger had, probably, killed.</font></font></font>

She sighed and stepped forwards...her students in more ways than one..each showing their own reaction but...most of fustration or well...taunting much less...an act of mmm....an act of...mm.

<font color = white>&#34;just stop it, you cant bind us to the village.&#34;</font>

She found her self looking back to the students..<font color = white>&#34;..mm...ehh..&#34;</font> they found their gaze falling back onto the man south of her. <font color = white>&#34;the entire wilderness is not your territoy. This village and the everything in a one click area of this place is apart of our land&#34;</font> She paused.

<font color = white>&#34;what is your leaders true intentions...&#34;</font>

What should sound and even look very rough actually seems much more inventive, smooth, more <i>mechanical</i>. As if he were filled with churning devices, and maybe even a static charge that slightly irradiated from him somehow.

To those with ever keen sight, his body had very clear grooves but not like the carving of wood into puppetry - it was more refined and held smoother parts.

<font color = white>&#34;I’m nothing but a messenger for my employers, and once <b>a boy myself</b>&#34;</font> Just for a moment he sounds young and surprisingly natural - as if he were no older than twelve. <font color = white>&#34;I donned your same headbands.&#34;</font>

He begins to step back, hands gripped tightly on both swords. <font color = white>&#34;You can collect your headbands and I’ll be on my way.&#34;</font> A very strict stare to the forces now building. <font color = white>&#34;But you’ve been warned. Stay in your place and we won’t have problems&#34;</font>

He glances towards the ground for but a moment, as if stepping carefully for some odd reason. With those having their eagle-like sight though? The area was littered with hundreds upon hundreds of explosive tags - all the way to the gate

If he was going to face an attack here, he at least had an ace up his sleeve. The actions were entirely dependent on Iwagakure though, as he attempts to let them collect and be on his way</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff>
Hana continued to listen to the commanding man, her attention unwavering despite the discomfort gnawing at her. The mechanical timbre of his voice grated against her ears, and the sudden switch to a childlike tone sent a shiver down her spine, amplifying the unease she felt. Every word he spoke heightened the tension, making the entire situation increasingly unsettling for her.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=4cc36a72cb702167c193e2a036ccb460e93f39a4735360308f1741bdf79cdfa1 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">The thoughtful, composed girl</a>)</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye brought her knuckles to her chin as she observed quietly. Shuye's talents were lacking in this department. She was not particularly observant; she didn't have the uncanny ability to sense the energy in things her brother had, either. Worse, she was barely a genin, physically. No, explosive ordnance disposal was far beyond her capabilities.

She wouldn't have spotted them without another shinobi calling it out.

A traitor to the village, daring to come to the front gates...?

Was Iwagakure so weak?</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#aa326e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> approached the scene, her eyes scanning over the crowd carefully before noticing someone outside of the gate-- Of course there was.

A sigh escaped her as she leapt overtop of the students, landing next to Chocho. Turning to face her for a moment, a smile is flashed, followed by a peace sign. She then finally turns her attention onto the stranger at their gates.
 <font color = white>&#34;Yo.&#34;</font>, she called out, looking him over from head to toe.

The camera in his eye was instantly spotted, alerting her to put her guard up. Perhaps it was nothing, or perhaps someone was actually coming to spy on them. Either way, it was work she didn&#39;t plan on having to deal with.
 <font color = white>&#34;If you&#39;re just dropping stuff off, that&#39;s fine.&#34;</font>, she began, her eyes looming over to the field behind him, noting the vast amount of explosive tags that were placed.

 <font color = white>&#34;Y&#39;know.. Someone has to clean those up, and it isn&#39;t gonna be me!&#34;</font>, she protested, venting another sigh. <font color = white>&#34;Whatever.. [2 / 4  Def T&#39;s]

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=eb4fcaf2705658c0d153d1a1679fc84bbe831ab9ea80c6a63648620553c47055 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The senile old man</a> yawns lazily as he joins the crowd of Iwagakure&#39;s kids. <font color = white>&#34;Good morning kids.&#34;</font> he greets the group as he barely manges to recognize their blurry figures despite his aging eyesight <font color = white>&#34;Seems like most of you are still half asleep though..&#34;</font> he sighs as he notices the silence and occasional snoring <font color = white>&#34;I swear.. kids these days live too comfortably.. when I was your age I would be already awake organizing wares.. tsk-tsk!&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Is that so?&#34;</font> She said slowly. She resisted the urge to say more about it.

<font color = white>&#34;What deals.. on ladles?&#34;</font> he repeats, wondering how poor the kid must had been to not even have the ryo to buy kitchen wares <font color = white>&#34;I didn&#39;t think this village lacked basic necessities like this.. <font color = white>&#34;Very well....100 Ryo down. For a Sword, nothing named mind you. But sufficent to cut down rats or the poor.&#34;</font> even as her words had ended, she had drew closer to the man. Her firey gaze locked to him and not wandering mindlessly up at the clouds or at a book.

<font color = white>&#34;Careful what toes you step on. This naughty girl does not respect her elders.&#34;</font> with that she gave a flip of her hair and had a seat, intent on going back to her reading. 

<font color = white>&#34;and I am a women grown. I am sure you have forgot what they look like stareing at whatever gargoyle your wives are.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Sup.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> .</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> returns from the librarys and seats himself near a tree.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Hello.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> pulls his heaven bound gaze down to the earth. <font color = white>&#34;Hello, Shuye.&#34;</font>, he greets gentley.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye asks:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Did you find any good books?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> shook his head ever so slightly as he spoke. <font color = white>&#34;Nothing on Xing.&#34;</font>
All his time at the library and all he&#39;d come to learn within this particular study was that the village had a severe lack of information surrounding foreign languages.
     Though, he didn&#39;t fault them. Books of the nature seemed to pale in comparison to those focused around Shinobi forefronts needs such as combat, tactical and medical guides. 

    <i><font color = white>&#34;Perhaps they were more important.&#34;</font></i> - he thought, dull eyes seeming to peer into the ethereal realm between both him and Shyue as his mind began to race.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye seemed briefly and subtly surprised, based off the widening and then narrowing of her eyes. She tried to remember if there were any books at home she could give him.

<font color = white>&#34;No luck learning a new language, then. There&#39;s a saying -- Rù xiāng suí sú.&#34;</font> The shift to a harsher, tonal language was jarring. <font color = white>&#34;When entering a village, follow its customs.&#34;</font>

Her people, few as they were, had taken that to heart.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> finds his focus pulled back in once more amongst the girl&#39;s shift into a different, natural tongue only to shift back into the one&#39;s he&#39;d come to know seemlessly.
    <font color = white>&#34;Mm..&#34;</font> - He seems to think for a moment, his eyes drifting toward her feet.

 <font color = white>&#34;Why are you here?&#34;</font>, he questions.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye tucked her hands into her sleeves, letting her almost minty green sleeves hang on either side. <font color = white>&#34;My clan lost their home. My dad says that the entire tribe travelled east until the land ended, and then built sailing ships and continued east until they found land again. Then...&#34;</font> She seemed a little unsure to continue, remembering how some of the other children had spoke about the shogunate, and about the previous kage--

<font color = white>&#34;...I don&#39;t really remember much, since I was so young. But my tribe met the shogun. We moved in here, to Iwagakure. My mom was...&#34;</font> more hesitation. <font color = white>&#34;...a chosen servant of the shogun, and he settled us here. But the duel of fates is cruel, so after my youngest sibling, she was--&#34;</font>

A moment was taken to remeasure her emotions, and settle them <font color = white>&#34;--released from her burden. Wán bì guī zhào.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> ears gave lifeless, near robotic analysis in the face of Shyue's rather obvious deterents from certain parts of her story. Upon her concluding her origin he continued to stare at the ground bellow her for a moment.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> says:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> says:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> . . .</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> looks up at her for a moment.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70>Then, back to the ground.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> Are you lying?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye quirked a brow.

<font color = white>&#34;Why would I?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> says:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> I&#39;m not sure.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye stepped forward.

<font color = white>&#34;Do you want me to be lying?&#34;</font> She questioned.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> eventually found his ground bound gaze consumed by the being before him&#39;s abdomen and he drags his gaze up to their own once more.
   He was unphased by their proximity.<font color = white>&#34;No.&#34;</font>, he answers.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye crouched down, leveling herself with him. She let a moment of silence linger.

<font color = white>&#34;Do you have any questions?&#34;</font> She offered. <font color = white>&#34;If there is no book, at least I can be a primary source.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> blinks for a moment, a dreamy haze overtaking his pupils as he began ot think.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> 's pupils would fill in.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> What is your goal here?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> I want to become the greatest medical shinobi to ever live. It&#39;s a humble goal.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> Why?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> What is your route?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye frowned, returning to the most natural expression she seemed to wear-- a scowl. This one is less directed. Internal. Her joke didn&#39;t seem to land. Finally, she seemed to come up with her answer.

<font color = white>&#34;I have no enemy except death. Therefore, I will deny it any victim, at every opportunity. I will slight it in every way I can. It took something important from me.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> eyes widen even so slightly as she spoken. She..
  Well she seemed to be just about his age yet she knew her. <font color = white>&#34;Purpose.&#34;</font>
    He says aloud.

   <font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s a beautiful thing.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye would smile from ear to ear; a rare sight. Even her teeth were visible, however briefly before she regathered her composure.

<font color = white>&#34;I have to be strong for my little siblings.&#34;</font> Her dad was -- kind, but broken. Shuye had to at once be a mother and a sister to her siblings, lest they grow up to be idiots and get themselves hurt. It left little time for being young and playful. <font color = white>&#34;So... I guess that&#39;s why it&#39;s hard to make friends.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> You don&#39;t have many friends?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye looked over at Venturo--

==================== katon burn perk ==================
Name: 

Incendiary Flame  

Desc:

 This character has mastered the art of sticky flame. By carefully molding their chakra, they produce fire from a chakra fuel that is adhesive and sticks to their target once they are struck. This makes it very difficult to remove and the fire will continue burning unless the victim employs precious seconds putting out the flames. 

Note:

Those struck by a fire technique continue to burn for petty injury for two turns. The victim may use their offensive action to put it out or use a water source of medium size or above.

=========== more info below of the status aliment below ===========

Name:

Numbing Joltage  

Desc:

This character has developed the ability to sustain an electrical current that courses through the body of their victim if they are unfortunate enough to be struck by a lightning technique. The current is delivered as a numbing jolt of electricity that stuns the victim, slowing their reaction times considerably. 

Note:

Those struck by an electrifying lightning technique lose two steps of speed, agility, hand seal tempo, and tile movement until the end of their next turn. 
</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#f25da8>Perhaps it was evil, or perhaps it was kind, but at least she wouldn&#39;t see what was coming this time. After all it was much easier to instantly feel pain than to see it about to hit her even if it was for a split second.

Fubuki didn&#39;t have time to react to the lightning which shocked her whole body, spiking up her hair and making her stand up completely. When the shock was over everyone nearby could smell the girl was a bit burnt, right before falling to the floor.

<font color = white>&#34;I-I-I-.---I---II....IIII...&#34;</font> the nervous shock had  been so severe she couldn&#39;t even speak, Fubuki was a frozen statue on the floor except for the occassional twitch. However this lasted only a few seconds before she stood up and regained her movement.

<u></u>Resolve Order<u></u>

Zettai Bogyo
  - Defensive jutsu and/or Instant techniques capable of defending against a ninjutsu <font color = white>&#34;breakthrough&#34;</font> and shurikenjutsu. 

Sealless Ninpo
 - Jutsu that require no hand seals. [not to be confused with gesture techniques] 

Shurikenjutsu
 - The use of throwing weapons; including Shuriken, Bo-Shuriken, Kunai, Senbon, and Shuriken Techniques. 

Jujutsu
 - Melee techniques, Sword techniques, CQC, and Grapples. 

Ninpo
 - Jutsu which include the use of handseals and/or gestures.

Were it not for his owner's hand he might have already kicked the boy in the face.

"<i>AGGRESSIVE DONKEY SOUNDS</i></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#808080><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=f3d84f1f75f786fc637d243ad9ff77eb280795e56306c91913e107cd2e980ee3 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #808080;">The afro haired kid</a> was curious what he'd could request here in the distant land.</font></font></font>

As she was of foreign origin, her music style was different than anything that had influenced him locally.
  It was peaceful, a meditation, and thought-provoking. There was a certain free essence to it.

   Yurei thought that it was beautiful, and so he stared at the young woman a bit slack-jawed.

  <font color = white>&#34;If you want me as a doll, I could help.&#34;</font> The Mugen said, blushing at her talents!</font></font></font>

       <font color = white>&#34;This is a game I learned as a child and I used it to determine who would have leftovers between me and my late brother.&#34;</font>

The tone was upbeat despite the tragic news. 

<font color = white>&#34;The game is simple and the winner will model and recieve the very first edition of my plushie collection for free. I&#39;ll start to sell them afterwards, and that is assuming you make enough of a name for yourself to earn one.&#34;</font>

The dice are thrown into the center for the group to expect. The numbers were digital-and advanced. <font color = white>&#34;The game is called &#39;200&#39;. Everyone will roll the dice using &#39;200&#39;. The number you get will act as your next roll number, and it could range from 199-to-1, it all depends on your luck.&#34;</font>

With a soft laugh, she concludes. <font color = white>&#34;You&#39;ll keep rolling &#39;your&#39; lowest number until you get to &#39;1&#39;. The last person to hit &#39;1&#39; will be the winner. Any questions?&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#be0000"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=acd63959934fdaceff0bc0f6dec5079e839cecc2712ba6ca072a4f70394ab74f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #be0000;">The somber-looking girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#be0000"><font color = white> Maybe we should be talkin&#39; to that one over there.. I think they said their name was Junji or somethin</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=eb4fcaf2705658c0d153d1a1679fc84bbe831ab9ea80c6a63648620553c47055 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The senile old man</a> shooes away the willful kid as he turns his attention to Ogura <font color = white>&#34;You are correct young man. The supply chain won&#39;t be fixed for a couple of months still.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff9999"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff9999"><font color = white> inspect*</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#be0000"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=acd63959934fdaceff0bc0f6dec5079e839cecc2712ba6ca072a4f70394ab74f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #be0000;">The somber-looking girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#be0000"><font color = white> I&#39;m a girl..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=8d83990b3416a04e693057e7be3e464e8e66b1037134ccbbfa1275219cd8e233 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The black haired male</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Sorry to hear that flute girl..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff9999"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff9999"><font color = white> It&#39;s okay, that is a story for another time.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=8d83990b3416a04e693057e7be3e464e8e66b1037134ccbbfa1275219cd8e233 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The black haired male</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> But alright...guess i will play,i already know im gonna lose.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye turned her attention back to A&#39;suno, and listened. As she started to describe the game, the smaller, blue-haired, angry-looking girl recognized it as the same game that other children had been playing near the arena. It even had the same name. She wondered if it spread from Akihabara, or if it had just spread to Akihabara. Either way, she was ready to play.

<font color = white>&#34;Prepare to lose, Yurei.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6e124bef416d8d9dc46897926a9ab46f86d4feb4dad5f39ff40b255b56798416 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The plump youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Ah, right</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6e124bef416d8d9dc46897926a9ab46f86d4feb4dad5f39ff40b255b56798416 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The plump youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Hey, mista&#39;</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#be0000"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=acd63959934fdaceff0bc0f6dec5079e839cecc2712ba6ca072a4f70394ab74f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #be0000;">The somber-looking girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#be0000"><font color = white> Let&#39;s hope this one isn&#39;t just for show..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=7d0a6a54c861c4b0ec6b3b57d13854e218323083e3a991310323ef8a45d2b35f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Mugen, Yurei [sliteyes]</a> listens to the explanation of the game.
 <font color = white>&#34;Sounds like it&#39;s based on a roll of the dice.&#34;</font> Therefore in his mind, if he lost, it was only fate.

  <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;ve got this. Their gonna be sowing Mugen dolls until their fingers bleed. Ehahaha.&#34;</font> He laughed.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#bcbc5e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6b627502823c324065098876c2fa065a278a68399126477fe1b90730ed8afa04 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #bcbc5e;">Ogura, Junji</a> stares at the plump youth for a moment.

<font color = white>&#34;I don&#39;t sell armor in your size, yet.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff9999"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff9999"><font color = white> I look forward to the challenge, &#34;Mugen&#34;.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> A duel... of the fates.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff9999"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff9999"><font color = white> If you&#39;re ready, you guys can circle up and start.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=8d83990b3416a04e693057e7be3e464e8e66b1037134ccbbfa1275219cd8e233 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The black haired male</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Who is going first?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> I will.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Come closer.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#bcbc5e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6b627502823c324065098876c2fa065a278a68399126477fe1b90730ed8afa04 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #bcbc5e;">Ogura, Junji</a> says:</b><span style="color:#bcbc5e"><font color = white> The forge isn&#39;t open at the moment, but I can take orders.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> ponders for a moment. <i><font color = white>&#34;Luck..&#34;</font></i></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> says:</b><span style="color:#8d8b70"><font color = white> I will join.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff9999"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff9999"><font color = white> I will await the winner. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye reached into her pocket--

<font color = white>&#34;Actually, I don&#39;t have a dice. Can I borrow one, A&#39;suno?&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6e124bef416d8d9dc46897926a9ab46f86d4feb4dad5f39ff40b255b56798416 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The plump youth</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Ah.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff9999><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b1676d8a631fb1dd8d46d2cfe66e8324088a6db2d975de54977d7f03e5580abd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff9999;">A'suno</a> flips a pair of cubes in the girl&#39;s direction. <font color = white>&#34;Here.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=6e124bef416d8d9dc46897926a9ab46f86d4feb4dad5f39ff40b255b56798416 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The plump youth</a> whispers faintly.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Sorry, I was teasing you.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> I&#39;m Shuye.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">The red-haired boy</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> T-That was a really long con... Nice to meet you though Shuye, I&#39;m Hideo.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye asks:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> I heard. Child of the vessel, right?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Uhuh!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Big expectations.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Yeah no kidding... Should be easy to meet them though!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Sup.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Yo Fubuki.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Anything interesting happen?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Other than my dreams of owning a sword, or something equally cool, being crushed nah.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Swords will come and go.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> You also want to own a sword?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#96003c><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> had been spaced out staring at the water and didn&#39;t realize Shuye approached him. Spacing back in he spins around to continue talking to her without being rude.

<font color = white>&#34;Yeah, with they&#39;d actually ever come though. They&#39;re like several bajillion ryo...&#34;</font>

He then looks to Fubuki and shrugs,

<font color = white>&#34;I just wanted to buy something shiny to be honest.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Hm. Well, I&#39;m only five hundred ryo short for a katana, thanks to Hana.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> That&#39;s pretty cheap for a sword.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I-It is?!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Yeah. The ones in this village&#39;s shop are like, eight thousand.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Wait- Who&#39;s Hana?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> A thousand ryo...? I&#39;m not even a ninja and have half that.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Maaaaan why does everyone have more money than I do?!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Oh, a friend I met. She gave me money.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Wish my friends would give me money...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> At least you have friends. That is a different sort of wealth.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#aa326e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> ears quirk up at the sound of &#39;buy something shiny&#39;.

With a overdramatic backflip from the arena, she lands next to the red-haired boy.
 <font color = white>&#34;Well let me show you my wares!&#34;</font>, she exclaimed.

Her hands came together, a loud clap echoing out, before she withdraws her hands apart towards either side of her. As her hands stretched out, shimmering pink crystals formed, making unique patterns along the way until she&#39;d finally reached as far as she could.
 <font color = white>&#34;Just fifty Ryo and I&#39;ll make a shiny object of your choice!&#34;</font>

Was she attempting to scam children? Yes. Did she care? Absolutely not.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye is a little too wise-- or perhaps, more accurately, a little too jaded, to fall for this.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#96003c><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> sloooowly turns to face Kitsumi. Clearly not having forgotten how quick she was to pawn the work of repairing the gate and stairs off on literally anyone else. His eyes narrow, staring at her for a moment. However he&#39;s immediately distracted by the crystals. His brain was smooth and the rocks were pretty.

<font color = white>&#34;A shiny object of my choice?! Out of crystal right? That&#39;d be awesome...&#34;</font>

He cups his chin in his hand and begins pondering what to ask for. Eventually snapping his fingers and holding out fifty ryo to the Shingen.

<font color = white>&#34;I want a crystal monkey!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Hideo, you want money yet you spend it on this?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Just... make him a mirror...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> What&#39;s the point of having money if I don&#39;t spend it- Shuye are you suggesting I&#39;m a monkey?!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> But you&#39;re always complaining about money, maybe save a little first...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye scowled externally, and smiled internally. Silence and eye contact is the answer.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I&#39;m not *complaining* about money! I just *want* money. There&#39;s a difference!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> says:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> Hm. I guess then, fair enough.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> And I want money so that I can spend it! Spending money makes me feel better.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#8d8b70><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e42f9ed9a30b6a30da981a71991fd1f9d1acb9e30dbbafb885a9cb68fe546e3b style = "text-decoration: none; color: #8d8b70;">Mugen, Raku [aloof]</a> continued flipping through his book.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#f25da8"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=fc0ba9dfa1b128fb42b8ccbc5a9cfa3faf726e163bfdb89a1445c74ff9dd4a62 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #f25da8;">Fubuki</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#f25da8"><font color = white> What do you want to spend it on though? Just anything?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I mean, anything that&#39;s cool yeah.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Liiiike a crystal monkey!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366ff">Zhu, Shuye says:</b><span style="color:#3366ff"><font color = white> Should have got a rock-candy monkey.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I don&#39;t think she can make rock-candy... But that does sound awesome!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#aa326e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> gave a nod in response before clasping her hands together once again. All the crystals she&#39;d formed turned into nothing but sparkles in the air as her hands met.
 <font color = white>&#34;Of course!&#34;</font>, she exclaimed once again, the prospect of profit clearly warranting more energy out of the normally aloof girl.

As her hands began pulling apart, a Curious George-esque monkey formed within her palms, shimmering against the sunlight. Little by little it came together, its slightly larger than body head forming first, followed by its body and limbs, until finally she added a little curved tail at the end.

Extending her hand out, she offered the piece to the boy.
 <font color = white>&#34;Now, my crystals are resistant to near everything in such compact form, so breaking it should be hard!... UnlessIdiebutthenwe&#39;reallscrewed.&#34;</font>, she finished with a bright smile.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#96003c><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> &#39;s eyes light up as Kitsumi begins. Watching with awe as the little paperweight takes shape. Mumbling to no one in particular as she works,

<font color = white>&#34;Maaan manipulating crystals is so cool...&#34;</font>

Taking the monkey, he holds it up toward the sun. Turning it around in the air and simply looking at the sparkles.

<font color = white>&#34;This is awesome!&#34;</font>

Then his ears perk up at the claim of it being extremely durable. A clear mental battle is fought as he resists the urge to drop it or rap a knuckle against it to test her claim. For a moment he wonder if she was actualyl lying and the complete opposite was true-

What if this thing was super fragile!

He carefully lowers it, now holding it in both hands. He nods to Kitsumi and says,

<font color = white>&#34;This is super cool. Thank you Kitsumi. Worth fifty ryo...&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#aa326e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#aa326e"><font color = white> Of course! I&#39;m available from nine-to-five on weekdays.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I-Isn&#39;t that just your normal shinobi hours?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#aa326e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#aa326e"><font color = white> Yep!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#aa326e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> taps the side of her head a few times.
 <font color = white>&#34;Smarter not harder.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye watched the display from the front row. Honestly, she was expecting it to be a total scam. It wasn't. The jounin was a surprisingly talented sculptor, and Hideo seemed very pleased by the item he received, too. If it was true that it wouldn't break...</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff0000><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=dd429bad6f73d253652865c17900904b0c01e87456b89bb54e3c20528222e38c style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff0000;">Utsuwa, Mugen</a> shook his head.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Sounds like you have too much free time even when on duty...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#aa326e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> says:</b><span style="color:#aa326e"><font color = white> Whaaaaaaaaaaaaaaat! Nooooooooo...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#aa326e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> leans forward towards the boy, gripping his shirt.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Guh-</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Thank you Shuye.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=984defa0af8733157a6ed8c229e0c87eeb253feafe13595d94589ffc7a468483 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">The reticent young boy</a> looked like a wreck, with the sun looming over Iwagakure, blinding the child. It's easy to assume that the child doesn't get out much. Blinking twice in a slow manner, the pocket mirror is placed away into a pouch as the 5'3 child continues to watch the proceedings of those present.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff0000><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=dd429bad6f73d253652865c17900904b0c01e87456b89bb54e3c20528222e38c style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff0000;">Utsuwa, Mugen</a> flickered towards his son, kicking up a gentle waft of dust, before kicking him into the water with a sideways kick.

<font color = white>&#34;Just get in the water you bastard&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#96003c><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> was in the process of holding out the crystalline monkey to Shuye as he&#39;s kicked in the chest. A pathetic grunt is shouted out as he is sent straight into the water.

<font color = white>&#34;Guh!&#34;</font>

Unfortunately he was a big kid and his clothes were now soaked. So rather than simply swim back to edge like a normal person; he flailed around helplessly for a few seconds. Splashing water everywhere and toward all those nearby. Before eventually realizing the moat wasn&#39;t very deep.

And remembering that he could walk on water. With a sigh he plants his hands on the surface of the water and pulls himself up and out. Shaking in place like a dog, trying to get rid of at least some of the water. Which, was almost entirely futile.

Grumbling to himself he returns to his spot and glares at his father.

<font color = white>&#34;You didn&#39;t have to call me a bastard too!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#aa326e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=d1b7293625c7f89c06da3ed56ad2aaab4f8ac9991953a2b401e0e124c1c5e80e style = "text-decoration: none; color: #aa326e;">The pale-skinned girl</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#aa326e"><font color = white> Hey, Mugen. On a scale of one-to-ten, how cool do you think a crystal statue of him would be?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff0000"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=dd429bad6f73d253652865c17900904b0c01e87456b89bb54e3c20528222e38c style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff0000;">Utsuwa, Mugen</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff0000"><font color = white> Is there a Negative? option.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> I can&#39;t believe you&#39;d say that about your eldest son...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Your only son!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ff0000"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=dd429bad6f73d253652865c17900904b0c01e87456b89bb54e3c20528222e38c style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff0000;">Utsuwa, Mugen</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ff0000"><font color = white> Whats tewelve more years, make another one. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff0000><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=dd429bad6f73d253652865c17900904b0c01e87456b89bb54e3c20528222e38c style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff0000;">Utsuwa, Mugen</a> raised an eyebrow.
<font color = white>&#34;What is it..&#34;</font>?</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366ff>Zhu, Shuye noticed, then, that he was on the wrong side of the arena...

<font color = white>&#34;Oh. Okay, I&#39;ll only show you...&#34;</font> She stepped back. <font color = white>&#34;If you use your ninja training to jump across the water.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#a6de8b><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bba6a75fceeefadd71177f9fe584645d0 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a6de8b;">Zhu, Meixun</a> let out an exascerbated sigh, looking at his clothing for a few moments. He still wasn't well versed enough to trot upon water just yet, so he'll need to settle with more.... Improvisational practices.

He formulates a few seals he remembered from a scroll read, then he lifted his undershirt, folding the linen neatly into a triangular plate before creasing each edge with both hands. Undoing the metallic string that held his tailed hair in the back--his hair's apparently getting longer--he wraps it around the congruent angle's point, folding that down to support the shape.

All of this was to make some sort of makeshift throwing item, to which the boy flexes his quads to toss off to the other side! Unfortunately for his aim, he ends up hitting Kitusmi, having said item dangle to the ground unceremoniously. Though there wasn't much of any time to react to that, he mosies over toward Fubuki, poking her before hissing a whisper.</font></font></font>

Can I be Ven?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#969696"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e96dd5bcc76d53dd8f8b0621ba373107eb149febb9023bc3d43d26e49e9f2c52 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #969696;">Tsuchigomo, Tsunek [Albino]</a> says:</b><span style="color:#969696"><font color = white> Tora works.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#938a6e"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b9d925a76c57b0ebc03e90d81e49339c5a83bd24a62a3c73a104c2033d6788ed style = "text-decoration: none; color: #938a6e;">The blond lad</a> says:</b><span style="color:#938a6e"><font color = white> Both the same type of creature either way.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#96003c"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=23b6a3fd8476cfd409230a3b7b0caadc2166ae8eb66f5ce77ab2aa09d2e5cc89 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #96003c;">Mugen, Hideo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#96003c"><font color = white> Yeah, you have to be Ven cause Turo is too close to Tora and it&#39;d get confusing. </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=7d0a6a54c861c4b0ec6b3b57d13854e218323083e3a991310323ef8a45d2b35f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Mugen, Yurei [sliteyes]</a> becomes more distant for a moment, fading away intellectually. He wasn&#39;t sure what anyone was even talking about. Re-establishing himself, the young man pinches his chin.

  <font color = white>&#34;Haven&#39;t seen anyone doing any combat training.&#34;</font> The young man sat on the ground comfortably and crossed one leg over his knee.

  <font color = white>&#34;Who wants to spar?&#34;</font> Yurei would be the first to officially make a challenge on the platform, smiling with casual energy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#e0a972"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=871eb675fccc62ddb557fcb6399a7c1e421486d131366d72ad8888218f5deb20 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #e0a972;">Venturo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#e0a972"><font color = white> But &#39;Turo&#39; and &#39;Tora&#39; could be a cool team up name...</font></font></font></span></span>

I&#39;d be down but we already know you&#39;d beat me haha.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#969696"><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=e96dd5bcc76d53dd8f8b0621ba373107eb149febb9023bc3d43d26e49e9f2c52 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #969696;">Tsuchigomo, Tsunek [Albino]</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#969696"><font color = white> Supplex them!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#938a6e><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=b9d925a76c57b0ebc03e90d81e49339c5a83bd24a62a3c73a104c2033d6788ed style = "text-decoration: none; color: #938a6e;">The blond lad</a> noticed late that someone had issued an open challenge.
     <font color = white>&#34;Any rules? Limitations?&#34;</font>

With that said, he made his way to the majorly vacant center of the arena. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x3000039];action=name;character=7d0a6a54c861c4b0ec6b3b57d13854e218323083e3a991310323ef8a45d2b35f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Mugen, Yurei [sliteyes]</a> chews idly on a piece of wheat.
  <font color = white>&#34;A Uchiha. .I thought they were supposed to be real strong.&#34;</font> He seems to blink a centimeter before looking to Katora.

   <font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s a practice battle, I&#39;m not sure what you want me to tell you.&#34;</font> Yurei stands and crosses his arms.</font></font></font>
